resources.string: Set app to full screen run _(:з」∠)_.
When this mode is enabled, you can directly select the target application within an Xposed manager that supports scoping to use Mode 1.
This mode works by hooking the target application\'s implementation.
This mode works by hooking the implementation of Android\'s display policy class, and it requires a reboot to take effect.

If this is your first time using it, please read these instructions carefully. This module modifies the system framework and could lead to issues like being unable to boot into the system. Please be prepared for recovery before use.
You can return directly now, and next time you launch, it won\'t jump to this screen first.

This Xposed module allows you to force applications into fullscreen mode. However, this is not a universal solution, meaning it may not be compatible with all apps or games. If you experience the module not working, abnormal display, or require specific adaptations, you\'ll need to contact the developers of the app or game directly. Reporting these issues to me will not lead to a resolution.
